SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.fragments

Class EventManagementFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.eventlottery.fragments.EventManagementFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
public class EventManagementFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
EventManagementFragment handles the management interface for a specific event. It allows organizers to view entrant lists (waitlist, accepted, declined), run the lottery, download entrant data as CSV, and view entrant locations on a map.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

      private void viewEntrantList(String fieldName, String title)
      Fetches user IDs from a specific Firestore field and displays them in a dialog.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - The Firestore field name containing the list of user IDs.
      title - The title to display on the dialog.

    • fetchUserNamesAndShowDialog

      private void fetchUserNamesAndShowDialog(List<String> userIds, String title, String fieldName)
      Resolves a list of user IDs to user names and shows them in a list dialog.
      Parameters:
      userIds - The list of user IDs to resolve.
      title - The title for the dialog.
      fieldName - The original field name (used for CSV export context).

    • showEntrantListDialog

      private void showEntrantListDialog(List<String> userNames, String title, String fieldName)
      Displays a dialog containing the list of user names and an option to download as CSV.
      Parameters:
      userNames - The list of user names to display.
      title - The title of the dialog.
      fieldName - The name of the list being displayed.

    • downloadEntrantList

      private void downloadEntrantList(String fieldName, String fileName)
      Downloads the list of users from a specific field as a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - The Firestore field name containing the user IDs.
      fileName - The base name for the downloaded file.

    • fetchUserNamesAndDownload

      private void fetchUserNamesAndDownload(List<String> userIds, String fileName)
      Resolves user IDs to names and triggers the CSV download.
      Parameters:
      userIds - The list of user IDs to export.
      fileName - The filename for the export.

    • showDrawLotteryDialog

      private void showDrawLotteryDialog()
      Displays a dialog prompting the user to confirm the lottery draw and set the sample size.

    • runLottery

      private void runLottery(int sampleSize)
      Executes the lottery draw using the LotteryManager and updates the UI on completion.
      Parameters:
      sampleSize - The number of winners to select.

    • loadEntrantLocations

      private void loadEntrantLocations()
      Fetches entrant locations from Firestore and plots markers on the Google Map.
